# collapsesBorders

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the text table borders are collapsible.

## Declaration

```swift
var collapsesBorders: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the text table borders are collapsible.
title: collapsesBorders
